text: The Idaho Legislature is the state legislature of the U.S. state of Idaho. It is a bicameral legislature. It has the lower Idaho House of Representatives and the upper Idaho Senate. There are 70 state representatives and 35 state senators. Legislators are elected in multi-member districts, with 2 representatives and one senator coming from 35 districts, each being elected every two years. ==References== Category:Idaho Legislature
title: Idaho Legislature
